title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown when attempting to create a new table group without setting the data set.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed, allowing the user to create the group, regardless of whether the data set is set or not.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a table report item without setting the data set. 2. Try creating a new table group.
